jimhud_dialog_force_start_desc:
Are you sure you want to force the game to start?

Please only use this for bugged lobbies, or if a player is afk.
Make sure everyone had enough time to choose his loadout.

Thanks :)
jimhud_dialog_rename_inv_tab_desc: Please enter the new name for this Inventory page.
woldhud_notification_disabled_override_d: If you changed your mind, click here to get asked again.
woldhud_notification_restart_override_de: Please restart your game to start the download.
jimhud_buy_all_assets_desc: Buy all the assets that you are permitted to acquire.
jimhud_preplanning_save_tooltip_desc: Save your current Plan, and have an easier time next time on this mission.
jimhud_preplanning_load_tooltip_desc: Opens a menu with all your saved plans.
jimhud_preplanning_reset_tooltip_desc: Removes all your assets from the current plan, as well as your votes.
jimhud_preplanning_reset_all_tooltip_des: Removes everyones assets from the current plan, as well as your votes.
jimhud_preplanning_delete_tooltip_desc: Clean up your saved plans and delete a few.
jimhud_preplanning_error_max_plans_reach: Maximum amount of saved Plans reached.
jimhud_preplanning_dialog_save_desc:
$PLAN


Please enter a name for this plan.
(Using an existing name will overwrite that plan.)
jimhud_preplanning_dialog_delete_desc: Are you sure you want to delete Plan '$NAME'?
jimhud_preplanning_msg_saved_failed: An error occurred while saving plan.
jimhud_preplanning_msg_no_save_slot: Maximum amount of saved Plans reached.
jimhud_preplanning_msg_no_current_plan: You have nothing planned, that can be saved.
jimhud_preplanning_msg_loaded_failed: An error occurred while loading plan.
jimhud_preplanning_msg_reseted_failed: An error occurred while resetting current plan.
jimhud_preplanning_msg_deleted_failed: An error occurred while deleting saved plan.
jimhud_preplanning_msg_folder_creation_f:
Failed to create folder: $FOLDER 
Please make sure the game has the required permissions or create it manually.
jimhud_preplanning_msg_file_creation_fai:
Failed to create file: $FILE 
Please make sure the game has the required permissions or create it manually.
jimhud_inv_tab_rename_hint: Double click the selected Inventory tab to rename it.
jimhud_locked_assault: Endless Police Assault!!!  Get out as soon as possible!!!
jimhud_vip_assault: Captain around!!!  Make him flee as soon as possible!!!
jimhud_options_help: Customize JimHUD with your personal preferences.
jimhud_language_desc:
Select a localization for JimHUD.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_menu_options_help: Change how the main menu works.
jimhud_gameplay_options_help: Change some of the ingame gameplay/controls.
jimhud_skip_blackscreen_desc:
Automatically skips the Blackscreen on Mission start.
(Host only)
jimhud_instant_restart_desc:
Automatically skips the 5 second timer before a restart in online lobbies.
(Host only)
jimhud_stat_screen_speedup_desc: Automatically speed up the experience counting, without needing to hold down space.
jimhud_stat_screen_delay_desc:
Proceeds X seconds, after your EXP got counted.
(Host only, 0 = disabled)
jimhud_loot_screen_pick_card_desc: Automatically pick a card, when the loot screen is displayed.
jimhud_loot_screen_pick_specific_card_de: Specify which card to pick automatically.
jimhud_loot_screen_delay_desc:
Proceeds X seconds after you got your loot drop.
(Host only, 0 = disabled)
jimhud_replace_weapon_names_desc:
Replace the Weapon Names with their Real-World counterparts.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_inventory_tab_names_desc:
Customize your Inventory Tab Names.
(Change names by editing '/mods/saves/JimHUD_InventoryNames.txt')
jimhud_inventory_names_desc: Show the names of your weapons, armor, deployables, etc. inside its box in the inventory.
jimhud_skill_names_desc: Always show the names of skills in the skilltree view.
jimhud_show_mini_icons_desc: Always show the mod icons of all weapons, not just the selected one.
jimhud_no_slowmotion_desc: Disable Slow Motion during mask up or when getting downed.
jimhud_reset_options_desc: Reset all Settings to their default value.
jimhud_reset_options_confirm: Are you sure, you want to reset all Settings to their default value?
jimhud_panels_options_help: Options for all the general HUD panels, as CustomHUD, Suspicion, Damage Indicator, DrivingHUD and many more.
jimhud_hud_style_desc:
Choose a custom HUD layout.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_adv_assault_desc:
Show assault phase, time and spawns left during assault.
(Host Only)
jimhud_assault_position_desc: Horizontal position of the Assault banner.
jimhud_pacified_civs_desc: Change the waypoint of untied civilians, while they are pacified.
jimhud_use_realammo_desc: Shows ammo left, not taking the rounds in your current magazine into account.
jimhud_enable_burstmode_desc: Enable a burst fire mode for your weapons.
jimhud_playerpanel_options_help: Setting for your own HUD Panel.
jimhud_teampanels_options_help: Settings for your Teammates HUD Panels.
jimhud_panels_position_desc: Horizontal position of the HUD panel.
jimhud_panels_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the HUD Panel.
jimhud_panels_oppacity_desc: Select the Opacity of the HUD panel.
jimhud_panels_truncate_tags_desc: Try to truncate clan tags from player names.
jimhud_panels_show_ping_desc: Show the players ping to you.
jimhud_panels_show_status_desc: Show the players status (health, armor, etc.)
jimhud_panels_condition_icon_color_desc: Set the color of the condition icon (downed, in custody, swan song, etc.)
jimhud_panels_show_special_equip_desc: Show the players picked up special equipment.
jimhud_panels_special_equip_rows_desc: Number of Special Equipment Items that get placed in one column.
jimhud_panels_show_callsign_desc: Show a callsign for that player.
jimhud_panels_show_stamina_desc: Shows a Stamina circle inside your Healthbar.
jimhud_panels_show_downcounter_desc:
Shows a downcounter for each non AI. 
The counter shows your downs left and your teammates downs count.
jimhud_panels_build_time_desc:
Show a joining players build for X seconds.
(0 = Always)
jimhud_panels_weapon_icon_desc: Which weapon icons do you want to see?
jimhud_panels_weapon_firemode_desc: Show weapon fire mode, or hide it.
jimhud_panels_interaction_time_desc: Only show teammates interaction, if its longer than X seconds.
jimhud_panels_use_ai_color_desc: Use a custom color for the names of bots. (This also affects dmg popups)
jimhud_panels_ai_color_desc: Set the custom color to use for the names of bots. (This also affects dmg popups)
jimhud_chat_waittime_desc:
The time after which the chat fades out
(0 = Never)
jimhud_chat_fontsize_desc: Font Size for the ingame Chat-Box.
jimhud_chat_outputlines_desc: Max Lines to display before scrolling is enabled.
jimhud_spam_filter_desc: Removes PocoHUD and [NGBTO] spam messages from your chat.
jimhud_chat_inputlines_desc: Number of lines of text you can type
jimhud_chat_colored_bg_desc: Colorize the line bg based on the message source
jimhud_suspicion_options_help: Options for the size of the detection panel, as well as its visible components.
jimhud_suspicion_scale_desc: Scaling factor for the suspicion panel elements.
jimhud_susp_numberic_outline_desc: Show a black outline around the numeric Suspicion text.
jimhud_killcounter_player_show_killcount: Display a killcounter on your HUD.
jimhud_killcounter_player_color_desc: Select the color for your killcounter.
jimhud_killcounter_player_show_special_d: Display kills of special enemies separately.
jimhud_killcounter_player_show_accuracy_: Display your current accuracy on your HUD.
jimhud_killcounter_team_show_killcount_d: Display a killcounter on your teammates HUDs.
jimhud_killcounter_team_color_desc: Select the color of the killcounters for your teammates.
jimhud_killcounter_team_show_special_des: Display kills of special enemies separately.
jimhud_killcounter_team_show_ai_desc: Do Bots get a Killcounter too?
jimhud_corpse_limit_desc:
How much corpses should we allow to lay around at the same time?
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_show_drivinghud_desc:
Show a little HUD in the bottom right while driving.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_drivinghud_show_vehicle_desc: Display a little image of the vehicle and masks of player driving with you.
jimhud_drivinghud_show_loot_desc: Display the vehicles currently loaded and maximum loot numbers.
jimhud_drivinghud_show_passengers_desc: Show the amount of passengers in the vehicle and the total amount of seats.
jimhud_drivinghud_show_gear_desc: Display which gear you are driving in.
jimhud_drivinghud_speed_in_mph_desc:
Display the speed in mph.
(Uses km/h otherwise.)
jimhud_drivinghud_show_rpm_desc: Display the vehicles revolutions per minute.
jimhud_infopanels_options_help: Options for the info boxes of HUD List.
jimhud_use_hudlist_desc: HUDList can display many useful things, incl. Drill timers, enemy or loot count, assets on the map, etc. (A Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_hudlist_scale_right_desc: Scaling factor of the right list items.
jimhud_hudlist_scale_left_desc: Scaling factor of the left list items.
jimhud_hudlist_scale_buff_desc: Scaling factor of the buff list items.
jimhud_hudlist_box_color_desc:
Front color for Left- and Right List Boxes.
(Currently a Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_hudlist_box_bg_color_desc:
Background color for Left- and Right List Boxes.
(Currently a Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_hudlist_civcolor_desc: Color for Civilians and Hostages in EnemyCounter.
jimhud_hudlist_thugcolor_desc: Color for Thugs and Mobsters in EnemyCounter.
jimhud_hudlist_copcolor_desc: Color for Cops, SWATs and Heavy SWATs in EnemyCounter.
jimhud_hudlist_specialcolor_desc: Color for Specials and Turrets in EnemyCounter.
jimhud_hudlist_progress_alpha_left_desc: Alpha value for the progress bars on left list items.
jimhud_hudlist_progress_alpha_right_desc: Alpha value for the progress bars on right list items.
jimhud_hudlist_progress_alpha_buff_desc: Alpha value for the progress bars on buff list items.
jimhud_infopanels_left_options_help: Options for the left info list.
jimhud_hudlist_show_timers_desc: Display Timers for Drills, Hacks, etc.
jimhud_hudlist_show_equipment_desc: Determine if we should display that equipment on the right side of your screen.
jimhud_hudlist_show_ecm_retrigger_desc: Show, when an ECM is ready to be retriggered.
jimhud_hudlist_show_minions_desc: Show health of all jokered Cops.
jimhud_hudlist_show_own_minions_only_des: Only display your own jokered Cops.
jimhud_hudlist_show_pagers_desc: Show Timer for remaining pager time, before the alarm triggers.
jimhud_hudlist_remove_answered_pagers_de: Remove the pager contour, if it is already getting answered.
jimhud_infopanels_right_options_help: Options for the right info list.
jimhud_hudlist_show_enemies_desc: Show the amount of Enemies on the map.
jimhud_hudlist_aggregate_enemies_desc: Show one HUD Box for all Enemies.
jimhud_hudlist_show_turrets_desc: Show amount of turret vans on the map.
jimhud_hudlist_show_civilians_desc: Show amount of untied civilians on the map.
jimhud_hudlist_aggregate_hostages_desc: Show all types of hostages in a singe info box.
jimhud_hudlist_show_pager_count_desc: Display the amount of triggered pagers while in stealth.
jimhud_hudlist_show_cam_count_desc: Show the amount of active cameras while in stealth.
jimhud_hudlist_show_bodybags_count_desc: Show the amount of bodybags in your extended inventory directly on your screen while in stealth.
jimhud_hudlist_show_corpse_count_desc: Show the amount of Corpses and bagged bodies on the map while in stealth.
jimhud_hudlist_show_loot_desc: Count the baggable Loot on the current map.
jimhud_hudlist_aggregate_loot_desc: Show all loot types in one count value.
jimhud_hudlist_separate_bagged_loot_desc: Separate unbagged and bagged loot counter.
jimhud_hudlist_show_potential_loot_desc:
Show the amount of crates on the map in the loot counter. 
(Remember, crates might be empty...)
jimhud_hudlist_show_special_pickups_desc: Show amount of chemicals, keycards and other stuff on the map.
jimhud_hudlist_show_mission_pickups_desc: Show amount of chemicals, keycards, planks and other mission pickups on the map.
jimhud_hudlist_show_collectables_pickups: Show amount of Gage packages, Spec-Ops Cases & Keys et cetera on the map.
jimhud_hudlist_show_valuables_pickups_de: Show amount of valuable items, like money bundles or necklaces on the map.
jimhud_infopanels_buff_options_help: Options for the buff info list.
jimhud_infopanels_buff_mastermind_option: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Mastermind Skills.
jimhud_infopanels_buff_enforcer_options_: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Enforcer Skills.
jimhud_infopanels_buff_technician_option: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Technician Skills.
jimhud_infopanels_buff_ghost_options_hel: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Ghost Skills.
jimhud_infopanels_buff_fugitive_options_: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Fugitive Skills.
jimhud_infopanels_buff_perkdecks_options: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Perk Decks.
jimhud_infopanels_buff_gageboosts_option: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Gage Boosts.
jimhud_infopanels_buff_henchmen_options_: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Henchmen Skills.
jimhud_hudlist_show_buffs_desc: Display active Buffs in the bottom center of your screen.
jimhud_hudlist_damage_increase_compbuff_: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all damage increasing skills.
jimhud_hudlist_damage_reduction_compbuff: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all damage reducing skills.
jimhud_hudlist_melee_damage_increase_com: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all melee damage increasing skills.
jimhud_hudlist_passive_health_regen_comp: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all passive Health regeneration effects.
jimhud_hudlist_total_dodge_chance_compbu: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all dodge increasing skills.
jimhud_waypoints_color_enable_desc: Changing color of the default mission waypoints.
jimhud_waypoints_color_desc: The color of the default mission waypoints.
jimhud_waypoints_show_ammo_bag_desc: Show Waypoints for Ammo bags, telling you the Percentage left.
jimhud_waypoints_show_doc_bag_desc: Show Waypoints for Doctor Bags, stating the number of charges left.
jimhud_waypoints_show_first_aid_kit_desc: Show Waypoints for First Aid Kits, showing its skill effects.
jimhud_waypoints_show_body_bag_desc: Show Waypoints for bodybag cases, telling you the amount of Bodybags left.
jimhud_waypoints_show_grenade_crate_desc: Show Waypoints for Grenade Cases, telling you the amount of Grenades left.
jimhud_waypoints_show_sentries_desc: Show Waypoints for Sentries, telling you the amount of ammo left.
jimhud_waypoints_show_ecms_desc: Show Waypoints for ECMs, telling you its remaining battery and feedback duration.
jimhud_waypoints_show_timers_desc: Show Waypoints for timers, telling you the time left and their active Upgrades.
jimhud_waypoints_show_loot_desc: Show the name of the loot above it, when looking near it.
jimhud_waypoints_loot_icon_desc: Show a bag icon on bagged loot.
jimhud_waypoints_loot_offset_desc: Set the height offset of the text label on loot.
jimhud_waypoints_loot_bagged_offset_desc: Set the height offset of the text label on bagged loot.
jimhud_waypoints_loot_angle_desc: Set the angle the text label is visible in.
jimhud_waypoints_show_special_equipment_: Show waypoints for various different equipments. Good to learn all the different locations.
jimhud_waypoints_show_minions_desc:
Show a Minions Name above its head, in the color of the player who converted him.
Also shows his Killcount.
jimhud_waypoints_show_pager_desc: Show a waypoint for activated pagers. Changes its color, when someone is answering it.
jimhud_tabstats_options_help: Configure the look of your Tabscreen.
jimhud_tabstats_clock_mode_desc: Which mode should the clock use?
jimhud_use_tabstats_desc:
Show your Statistics on Tab Screen instead, of the Mission briefing.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_tabstats_font_size_desc: Font Size for the advanced statistics list.
jimhud_tabstats_color_desc: Color for the advanced statistics list.
jimhud_tabstats_actual_mask_desc: Use your Actual mask instead of your played character picture.
jimhud_tabstats_numberic_loot_desc: Disable the bag counting minigame and display the number right away.
jimhud_lobby_options_help: Change how the Lobby and Briefing screens work.
jimhud_crewloadout_lobby_desc: Adds a button to your Lobby screen, that can display the loadout of you and your crew.
jimhud_crewloadout_cs_lobby_desc: Adds a loadout tab right next to the modifiers and rewards in the crimespree lobby.
jimhud_crewloadout_briefing_desc: Replaces the default Crew Loadout Panel in Mission briefing with an extended one, that shows all equipment.
jimhud_crewloadout_tabscreen_desc:
Displays the Skills, Perk and current Ping of players in your lobby. 
(Disabled if you use this feature of LobbyPlayerInfo)
jimhud_profilemenu_replace_desc: Replaces the default Profile-Selector with JimHUDs advanced one.
jimhud_dmgindicator_options_help: Set the fade time, size and colors or your damage indicators.
jimhud_show_dmg_indicator_desc: Turns the 4 static damage indicators into several dynamic ones, moving according to your position and the position you were damaged from.
jimhud_dmg_ind_time_desc: Determines the time, the indicator will be shown.
jimhud_dmg_ind_size_desc: Determines the size of the circle, the Indicators are placed around.
jimhud_dmg_indicator_max_count_desc: Specify the max amount of damage indicators on your screen.
jimhud_dmg_shield_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when you only lose armor.
jimhud_dmg_health_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when you lose health.
jimhud_dmg_crit_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when your health is getting low.
jimhud_dmg_vehicle_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when the vehicle you are in gets hit.
jimhud_dmg_friendlyfire_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when you get hit by fire or explosives.
jimhud_dmgpopup_options_help: Popup near an enemies head, displaying the damage dealt.
jimhud_dmg_popup_scale_desc: Changes the size of the damage popups.
jimhud_dmg_popup_skull_scale_desc: Changes the size of the skull icon when it was a kill.
jimhud_dmg_popup_skull_align_desc: Changes the alignment of the skull icon when it was a kill.
jimhud_dmg_popup_time_desc: Determines how long the popup will stay.
jimhud_dmg_popup_height_desc: Determines how high above the enemy the popup will render.
jimhud_dmg_popup_alpha_desc: Set the opacity of the popup.
jimhud_dmg_popup_color_desc: Set the color of the popup for bodyshots
jimhud_dmg_popup_critical_color_desc: Set the color of the popup for critical hits.
jimhud_dmg_popup_headshot_color_desc: Set the color of the popup for headshots.
jimhud_enemyhealthbar_options_help: Determine which units should get an healthbar.
jimhud_show_enemyhealthbar_desc:
Display Enemy Healthbar at the top enter, when aiming at an enemy.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
jimhud_show_civhealthbar_desc: Also show Healthbar for Civilians and TeamAI.
jimhud_show_healthbar_pointer_desc: Show Arrow under the Healthbar, aiming at the Owner of the Healthbar.
jimhud_press2hold_options_desc: Also known as Press2Hold or Push2Interact
jimhud_press2hold_lock_mode_desc:
Lock, when already interaction for more than X seconds. (Progress)
Lock, when total Interaction Time is more than X seconds. (Total) (0 = always)
jimhud_press2hold_min_timer_duration_des: The Min Timer Duration for the Interaction to lock.
jimhud_press2hold_show_lockindicator_des: Show transparent red/green circle overlay, to indicate weather the interaction is locked or not.
jimhud_press2hold_equipment_cancel_desc:
Interrupt a locked Interaction with your equipment key.
(Otherwise by pressing your Interaction key again.)
jimhud_press2hold_interrupt_hint_desc: Show a text to remind you, which button will interrupt your Interaction.
jimhud_press2hold_show_timer_desc: Display the remaining time inside the Interaction circle.
jimhud_press2hold_show_circle_desc: Determine if the standard interaction circle should be displayed.
jimhud_press2hold_circle_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the interaction circle.
jimhud_press2hold_timer_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the center timer (Takes circle scale into account).
jimhud_press2hold_text_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the interaction text below the circle.
jimhud_press2hold_show_reload_circle_des: Determine, if we should show a reload as an interaction.
jimhud_press2hold_show_melee_circle_desc: Determine, if we should show a melee charge as an interaction.
jimhud_press2hold_timer_color_start_desc: Color for the Timer to start with.
jimhud_press2hold_timer_color_desc: Color for the Timer to reach on completion.
jimhud_press2hold_show_timer_outline_des: Show a black outline around the remaining time text.
jimhud_doubletap_nades_stealth_desc:
When checked, you need to doubletap to throw a nade in stealth. 
Only to prevent accidents.
jimhud_hold_to_pick_desc: Small loot will be automatically picked up, while pressing your interaction key.
jimhud_inventory_options_help: Options to change the visuals of your Inventory and alter Equipment behavior.
jimhud_equipment_senty_auto_ap_desc: Sentries will spawn in AP Mode, if you have the required Skill.
jimhud_equipment_tripmine_auto_sensor_st: Trip-Mines will spawn in Sensor Mode, while you are in stealth.
jimhud_equipment_ecm_feedback_disabled_s: ECM Feedback will be disabled during stealth.
jimhud_equipment_shaped_charge_disabled_:
When checked, you need to doubletap to deploy shaped charges in stealth. 
Only to prevent accidents.
jimhud_equipment_keycard_doors_disabled_:
When checked, you need to doubletap to close doors in hoxton breakout day 2. 
Only to prevent accidents.
jimhud_flashlight_options_help: Specify your custom flashlight cone options.
jimhud_laser_autoon_desc: Automatically turns the laser gadget on at startup, on weapons that have one.
jimhud_show_angeled_sight_desc: Tilt the weapon in your Hand, while the angled sight is enabled.
jimhud_gadget_team_sentry_laser_options_: Settings for your Teammates sentries lasers.
jimhud_gadget_sniper_laser_options_help: Setting for the lasers of enemy snipers.
jimhud_gadget_turret_laser_active_option: Laser settings for the active SWAT turret.
jimhud_gadget_turret_laser_rearming_opti: Laser settings for the reloading SWAT turret.
jimhud_gadget_turret_laser_mad_options_h: Laser settings for the jammed SWAT turret.
jimhud_gadgets_enabled_desc: Use this definition instead of the gadget configuration.
jimhud_gadgets_beam_r_desc: Red component of the laser color.
jimhud_gadgets_beam_g_desc: Green component of the laser color.
jimhud_gadgets_beam_b_desc: Blue component of the laser color.
jimhud_gadgets_dot_match_desc: Determines, if the laser dot should match the beam in color.
jimhud_gadgets_dot_r_desc: Red component of the laser dots color.
jimhud_gadgets_dot_g_desc: Green component of the laser dots color.
jimhud_gadgets_dot_b_desc: Blue component of the laser dots color.
jimhud_gadgets_glow_match_desc: Determines, if the lasers glow should match the beam in color.
jimhud_gadgets_glow_r_desc: Red component of the laser glow color.
jimhud_gadgets_glow_g_desc: Green component of the laser glow color.
jimhud_gadgets_glow_b_desc: Blue component of the laser glow color.
jimhud_gadgets_light_r_desc: Red component of the flashlight color.
jimhud_gadgets_light_g_desc: Green component of the flashlight color.
jimhud_gadgets_light_b_desc: Blue component of the flashlight color.
jimhud_gadgets_light_angle_desc: The angle the flashlight shines in.
jimhud_gadgets_rainbow_frequency_desc: Determines how fast the rainbow changes colors.
jimhud_gadgets_pulse_min_desc: Minimum Opacity modificator that gets used.
jimhud_gadgets_pulse_max_desc: Maximum Opacity modificator that gets used.
jimhud_gadgets_pulse_frequency_desc: Determines the time it takes the pulse from minimum to maximum opacity multiplicator.
jimhud_assaultbanner_options_help: Options to change the Assault Banner.
